channel.title: Physics on Codeless Code
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Codeless Code

item.title: Quadtree Particle Simulation
item.description: A JavaScript particle physics simulation using a quadtree spatial data structure to efficiently compute inter-particle forces, optimizing from O(nÂ²) to near-linear complexity.

item.title: Double Pendulum
item.description: An interactive JavaScript simulation demonstrating the chaotic behavior of a double pendulum system, showcasing how small changes in initial conditions lead to dramatically different outcomes.
